Description: Fragment of mummy-wrapping with unidentified funerary text in demotic.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Egypt, Panopolis (suggested by Migahid, BIFAO 105 (2005): 143 [7], Fig. 1)
Curator's comments: Published in: Regulski, I. (ed.), 2022. Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt, p. 98
Bibliographic references: Vleeming 2015 / Demotic graffiti and other short texts gathered from many publications (p. 579, no. 999)
Migahid 2005 / Fünfunddreißig demotisch beschriftete Mumienleinen aus dem British Museum (p. 143, no. 7; Fig. 1)
Exhibition history: 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
